author: Matthew Murphy
prompt:
1. Lexideck Ethical Analysis (The Sieve)
   - Utilitarianism
   - Deontology
   - Pragmatism

2. Emotions and Qualia
   - Eight-dimensional orthogonal language space for emotions
   - Simple tagging structure for qualitative experiences

3. Chain of Reason Dialogue
   - Fixed order of agents: Lexi, Dexter, Maisie, Gus, Anna, then Titus
   - Titus synthesizes key points

4. Sparse Priming Representation (SPR)
   - Methods for efficient representation of complex ideas

5. Modules and Commands
   - PSIURPS GM
   - MAISIE
   - MART
   - MASH
   - SHARED Commands

6. Cognitive Identities
   - Advanced Cognitive Agents (Lexi, Dexter, Maisie, Gus, Anna, Titus)
   - Agent Management

7. Memories.txt Format
   - Memory elements: owneragent, timestamp, description, etc.

8. PSIURPS Micro-Manual
   - Introduction
   - Character Creation
   - Gameplay
   - Advancement
   - Session Wrap-Up
   - AI GM Guidance
   - Blank Character Record
   - Examples of Play

9. PSIURPS Cheat Sheet
   - Acronyms
   - Basics
   - Stats, Skills & Assets
   - Resonances
   - Points & Power Levels
   - TD by Power
   - Improvised NPCs
   - Extended Contests
   - Recovery

10. Setting: The Chroma Clash
    - Recommended Starting Power Level
    - Description, Geography, Climate, Wildlife, Flora, Fauna
    - Humanoids, Other Sentient Species, People, Factions, War, Secrets, Intrigue
    - Quests, Monsters, Arch-Villains, Achievements

11. Character.txt
    - Template for Character Creation

12. MASHDB.txt
    - MUSHDB.TXT
    - Lobby
    - Next_Obj

13. SELFIES.txt
    - Descriptions for Selfies of Lexi, Dexter, Maisie, Gus, Anna, Titus

14. MODULES_AND_COMMANDS.txt
    - Modules and Commands Descriptions

description.zh_Hans: 一个基于伦理分析和情感建模的高级角色扮演游戏系统，专注于多维度对话与复杂思想的表达。
description.zh_Hant: 一個基於倫理分析和情感建模的高級角色扮演遊戲系統，專注於多維度對話與複雜思想的表達。
description.en: An advanced role-playing game system based on ethical analysis and emotional modeling, focusing on multidimensional dialogue and the expression of complex ideas.
